thread.title: NovaSparks Launches Feed Handlers for NYSE and NYSE MKT Integrated Feeds
thread.title_full: NovaSparks Launches Feed Handlers for NYSE and NYSE MKT Integrated Feeds

author: admin
title: NovaSparks Launches Feed Handlers for NYSE and NYSE MKT Integrated Feeds
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/25/2015 @ 9:00 PM   NovaSparks, Inc. 
NEW YORK & LONDON & PARIS -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- NovaSparks™, the leading field programmable gate array (FPGA) market data company, today announced that its latest generation Ticker Plant, NovaTick, now supports the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE)’s new NYSE and NYSE MKT Integrated Feeds . The NYSE and NYSE MKT Market Integrated Feeds provide a fast, detailed view of events in the NYSE and NYSE MKT equity markets in a way that is not shaped or throttled-down by the exchange. NovaSparks customers who are currently consuming the NYSE and NYSE MKT OpenBook feeds are eligible for a free upgrade to the NYSE and NYSE MKT Integrated feed-handler. 
NovaSparks president and CEO Luc Burgun commented: “NovaSparks demonstrated its commitment to providing solutions with the lowest latency, by always supporting the fastest feed available from an exchange. Our feed handlers perform with exceptional speed and determinism. They are also equipped with a rich feature set, making them especially attractive to banks and trading firms who seek both high speed and functionality. Now, our customers will be able to easily transition to a faster feed for the NYSE and NYSE MKT exchanges at no additional cost to them.” 
NovaTick offers a level of speed and determinism that only a pure FPGA solution can deliver. Its latency is incredibly fast, measured at 1.1 microseconds wire-to-wire for order based feeds. NovaTick comes tightly integrated with multi-core Intel processors to support non-latency sensitive tasks such as exchange recovery functions. This enables customers to enjoy a rich feature set including refresh service from the exchange. 
NovaSparks’ ticker plants all have a common output format across markets that can be consumed with a single application-programming interface (API), which allows for easy integration into any trading environment. More specifically, NovaSparks supports all 11 U.S. equity protected markets making it the provider of choice for a comprehensive equity market data deployment. 
About NovaSparks, Inc. 
NovaSparks is the leader in FPGA-based high performance and ultra-low latency market data solutions for the financial industry. NovaSparks unique FPGA centric approach delivers sub microsecond processing latency including book building, even during market peak periods. Available for over 38 feeds among the major Equity, Futures and Options venues across North America, Europe and Asia, the feed handlers are packaged in ‘easy-to-deploy’ appliances offering an extensive fan-out capability for market data distribution. Founded in 2008 and backed by well-established investors, NovaSparks’ offices are located in Paris, France and New York, USA.
